title: Kawhi's Comments, GSW's Future & KAT On Anthony Edwards
description:
Brian Windhorst, Ramona Shelburne and Monica McNutt discuss what’s going on with the LA Clippers, Kawhi’s comments having weight behind them, the outlook for the Golden State Warriors heading to the trade deadline & beyond, and Karl Towns’ comments on Anthony Edwards. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
